properties.verseOrder: v1 v1 v2 v1 v3 v3 v4 v3

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Adoremus te, Jesu Christe,
Alleluia Alleluia!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Et laudemus, te Jesu Christe,
Et laudemus, te Alleluia!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sembah bagiMu, Yesus Kristus,
Puji bagiMu Alleluia!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Puji bagiMu Yesus Kristus,
Puji bagiMu, Alleluia!
